step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move.
Focus on reaching your arms overhead and opening your fingers wide.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale.
Excellent! Stretch your arms back overhead and exhale as you relax.
You completed the first repetition well. Continue focusing on controlled movements.
Second repetition starting. Remember to keep your arms relaxed and fingers open.
Reach your arms overhead and open your fingers wide.
Good form making a fist and squeezing shoulder blades. Remember to inhale.
Well done stretching arms overhead and exhaling. Relax your muscles.
You've finished the exercise! Overall, you maintained good form throughout, focusing on the movements and breathing cues.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms reaching overhead and fingers open, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you relax back. Keep up the good work!
